# 문제 1
정규분포 pdf 값을 계산하는 자신만의 파이썬 함수를 정의하고, 정규분포 mu = 3, sigma = 2 의 pdf를 그릴 것.
scipy.stats 함수 사용 안하고 하기.

![정규분포 함수 식](../../img/정규분포 식.png)

::: {#6a32970d .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import math
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
```
:::


::: {#f6a8c89a .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def nomal_distribution_function(x, mu, sigma):
    result=(np.exp(1)**((((x-mu)/sigma)**2)/(-2)))/(sigma*np.sqrt(2*(math.pi)))
    return result
```
:::


::: {#9251b1a3 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
myresult = nomal_distribution_function(0, 3, 2)
print(myresult)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.06475879783294587
```
:::
:::


::: {#d2cdd699 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
x = np.linspace(16, -10, 100)
y = nomal_distribution_function(x, 3, 2)
plt.scatter(x, y)
plt.show()
plt.clf()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](hw4_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-1.png){width=587 height=411}
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
```
<Figure size 672x480 with 0 Axes>
```
:::
:::


# 문제 2
파이썬 scipy 패키지 사용해서 다음과 같은 확률을 구하시오.
X ~ N(2, 3^2)
1) P(X < 3)
2) P(2 < X < 5)
3) P(X < 3 or X > 7)

::: {#324d7164 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import bernoulli
from scipy.stats import binom
from scipy.stats import norm
```
:::


::: {#13343183 .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#1
norm.cdf(3, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=14}
```
np.float64(0.6305586598182363)
```
:::
:::


::: {#1033e3b1 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#2
norm.cdf(5, 2, 3) - norm.cdf(2, 2, 3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=15}
```
np.float64(0.3413447460685429)
```
:::
:::


::: {#3f38b5a4 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#3
norm.cdf(3, 2, 3) + (1 - norm.cdf(7, 2, 3))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=16}
```
np.float64(0.678349012091051)
```
:::
:::


# 문제 3
LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균이 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다.
상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?

::: {#3e449693 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.ppf(0.95, 30, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=17}
```
np.float64(33.28970725390295)
```
:::
:::
